Arizona Winter School 1998
Course Descriptions and Notes

Courses

  • SHORTTITLE  Alexandru Buium: Differential algebras and diophantine geometry

    • Abstract: html
    • Reading list: html
    • Lecture notes: dvi, ps, pdf

  • SHORTTITLE  Henri Darmon: Frey’s method and hyperelliptic curves with real multiplication

    • Abstract: html
    • Reading list: html
    • “Rigid local systems, Hilbert modular forms, and Fermat’s last theorem,” CICMA preprint submitted for publication: dvi, ps, pdf
    • Web site

  • SHORTTITLE  David Masser: ABC - diophantine approximation aspects

    • Reading list: html

  • SHORTTITLE  Barry Mazur: Visible elements in the Shafarevich-Tate group

    • Abstract: html
    • Reading list: html
    • “Three lectures about the arithmetic of elliptic curves”: dvi, ps, pdf

  • SHORTTITLE  Lucien Szpiro: Some cases of the discriminant conjecture

    • Reading list: html

  • SHORTTITLE  Paul Vojta: A more general ABC conjecture

    • Abstract: html
    • Reading list: html
    • “A more general abc conjecture”: dvi, ps, pdf
    • “Chapter 0” of preliminary material on number theory and algebraic geometry: dvi, ps, pdf

  • SHORTTITLE  Felipe Voloch: The Brill-Segre formula and the ABC conjecture

    • Abstract: html
    • Reading list: html
    • Lecture notes: dvi, ps, pdf

  • SHORTTITLE  Professional development: Cathy Kessel: Teaching lower-division undergraduates

    • Kessel spoke on “Removing the discontinuity between high-school and college” and led a workshop on “Tools to teach intuition”. There was also a panel discussion on lower division courses.
    • Abstract: html
    • “Teaching Mathematical Problem Solving”: ps, pdf
    • References: ps, pdf
